I love the reclaimed doors and all the hidden bonuses (there's a cabinet full of games). Beautiful little kitchen I would have loved to use with plenty of dishware, coffee pods ready to go, and we very much appreciated the ice in the freezer and Brita pitcher in the fridge. Lovely shower gels and plenty of towels, the tub is a little small but still comfy for a bath and the shower has a range of good pressures with different settings (depending on what you prefer from hard to gentle but consistent). There's even a washer and dryer, this little place is literally a full home that I could have happily stayed in for a week or longer!
We did hear the animals, the chickens (crowing roosters) and ducks (chatting in honks as they waddle along) wander through the yard, but I heard them more from the bathroom and they didn't bother me from the bedroom. We met two cats who were very friendly once they knew we wanted to say hi and give them pets.
